alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:06AM CDT until May 27 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Chikaskia River near Corbin affecting Sumner County. For the Chikaskia River...including Corbin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chikaskia River near Corbin. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying areas can be expected, especially along the right bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Chikaskia River Corbin 10.0 9.4 Thu 7 am CDT 5.8 3.8 3.5 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
